descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: The Heat turn defense into offense as Jimmy Butler picks off a Grizzlies pass and dishes to Duncan Robinson for the lay-in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler's steal sets up Robinson for bucket) 2021/4/6 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler's steal sets up Robinson for bucket
